title: [Epidemiology] New antibody neutralizes all known SARS-CoV-2 variants in lab tests - Harvard Medical School

[Epidemiology] The Province of Alberta spent $61.3 million in avoidable healthcare spending on intensive care unit costs for unvaccinated patients, as a result of 1,028 avoidable ICU admissions (13,015 bed-days and 61.8% of baseline ICU bed capacity), during the Delta wave of COVID in the final 4 months of 2021
